attr.reversibility: can be life-threatening if left untreated
attr.pathogenesis: body's immune system mistakenly attacks and destroys its own red blood cells

reference: Canine autoimmune hemolytic anemia: management challenges - https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC6055891/
